title: Google\Cloud\EssentialContacts\V1\SendTestMessageRequest
name: SendTestMessageRequest
description:
Request message for the SendTestMessage method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.essentialcontacts.v1.SendTestMessageRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.contacts
params.description: Required. The list of names of the contacts to send a test message to. Format: organizations/{organization_id}/contacts/{contact_id}, folders/{folder_id}/contacts/{contact_id} or projects/{project_id}/contacts/{contact_id}

params.name: data.resource
params.description: Required. The name of the resource to send the test message for. All contacts must either be set directly on this resource or inherited from another resource that is an ancestor of this one. Format: organizations/{organization_id}, folders/{folder_id} or projects/{project_id}

params.name: data.notification_category
params.description: Required. The notification category to send the test message for. All contacts must be subscribed to this category.
